content: Hey, my name is Nikita. I want to actively participate in the Rust compiler development. Currently I see 5k+ issues, but may be some active contributor can take me as a an assistant to a small scale simple issues to make me involved into development workflow to become more autonomous in future. Currently Im searching something in issues to assign on myself :)
@Nikita Krupitskas for simple issues take a look at https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/75080, lots of work to be done but no deep knowledge of the compiler needed :)
can send you some issues to work on :smile:
